svg.content: <mxfile host="Electron" modified="2022-07-15T21:15:17.004Z" agent="5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) draw.io/18.0.1 Chrome/100.0.4896.143 Electron/18.2.0 Safari/537.36" etag="PRZqUX-EcDd_2S0c6mqo" version="18.0.1" type="device"><diagram name="Insatiable Planning" id="efa7a0a1-bf9b-a30e-e6df-94a7791c09e9"></diagram></mxfile>

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 282px; height: 240px; padding-top: 0px; margin-left: 810px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left; width: 280px; height: 240px; overflow: hidden;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "JetBrains Mono"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; width: 100%; height: 100%; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

p.style: margin: 0px ; margin-top: 4px ; text-align: center ; text-decoration: underline

div.p: 2. Get monster to move to player
3.1 Made Burn Skull Basher - Chrono made it
3.2 Added enlarged pixel display, took the whole day, still needs tweaking

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 282px; height: 240px; padding-top: 280px; margin-left: 170px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left; width: 280px; height: 240px; overflow: hidden;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "JetBrains Mono"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; width: 100%; height: 100%; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

p.style: margin: 0px ; margin-top: 4px ; text-align: center ; text-decoration: underline

div.p: 1. Parts of monsters become you, you are the weapon, eyes,Â heart, flesh, crystal.

p.span: 2. As the monster parts are absorbed into you, you become more corupt.
3. For now you have to walk into other enemies to damage them.
